name: flaw
structure: Produces entries for different types of genres and worlds. The 'common' and 'rare' tables are generic and should be compatible with almost any world. To retain compatibility with most settings, the  non-generic tables should be called only from other tables by specifying their name directly.
note: Developed from the quirk generation section of 'Goblin Names' generator by Ron Calbick.
authors: Ron Calbick (as extracted from his goblin-names.json generator), ELF Vesala.

tables.name: init
tables.explanation: Initializing the required global variables, if any.

tables.name: deformed
entries: takes great pride in a club foot, claiming to be marked as favored by the gods
takes great pride in a club hand, claiming to be marked as favored by the gods

tables.name: unhealthy
entries: takes great pride in a club hand or foot, claiming to be marked as favored by the gods.
wheezes loudly constantly and becomes out of breath while conducting even the simplest activities
is always sweating, even at rest or in cool conditions, and smells more unpleasant than usual as a result
shivers constantly as if cold or suffering from some sort of uncontrollable muscle spasms

tables.name: insane
entries: frequently speaks to an ordinary object and treats it as the most valuable item in the world
is always chewing on small pieces of wood and carrying them about as if they were artwork
is often heard speaking to unseen presences, often carrying on long conversations and arguments
is extremely paranoid, frequently looking around or over either shoulder and telling others to be on the lookout for 'them'

tables.name: phobic
entries: is fearful of trees and savagely attacks any tree nearby to be sure it's not hostile
is deathly afraid of books and writing, believing that such things consume one's soul during their creation

tables.name: psychological
entries: is incredibly forgetful with even the simplest things, such as getting dressed or bringing a weapon along for a raid
occasionally hallucinates and begins waving both hands frantically in the air as if fending off a swarm of insects
often stares at nothing, mouth agape and seemingly out of touch with everything unless adressed directly
lies about nearly everything and is fond of making up wild stories about imaginary deeds of heroism
often speaks in another language that involves a lot of grunting and doesn't even actually exist.
has a tendency to play with fire and takes great delight in watching things burn

tables.name: eccentric
entries: is narcoleptic, always yawning and drowsy, and sometimes simply curls up in a ball and falls asleep
is exceedingly lazy yet constantly whines about always having to do the hardest work

tables.name: communication
entries: stutters horribly whenever speaking, made worse by frantic gesturing in an attempt to communicate
is mute but often sneers and growls at just about anything and everything

tables.name: appearance
entries: has a severe overbite and is quick to anger when anyone makes note of the fact, either by staring or speaking of it

tables.name: senses
entries: has very poor eyesight and has a tendency to squint to see anything more than a short distance away

tables.name: myth
tables.explanation: Flaws once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: fantasy
tables.explanation: Flaws for fantasy worlds (with no basis in myth).

tables.name: frequency
tables.explanation: How often the flaw is demonstrated.

tables.name: test
tables.explanation: Test routine for checking the generator functionality.
entries: {init}result: {result}, summary: {summary}, detail: {detail}, common: {common}, rare: {rare}, myth: {myth}, fantasy: {fantasy}, modern: {modern}, futuristic: {futuristic}, special {special}.
